components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks in Mexico

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Multiple Networks in Mexico. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Multiple Networks in Mexico. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 December 2024 at 20:00 PST until 10 December 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter scheduled maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance activity: We would be updating the TaskRouter database, in the US1 region, to remove non-essential components from the system. There are pre and post activities around this update and hence this longer maintenance window of 2 hours. The actual database update, however, is expected to be completed within a second and would not impact your service. 

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after the maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 2 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - TaskRouter
